pages.title: Plastic Production
pages.text: To make $(item)Brittle Plastic$() you will first need to retrieve $(item)Latex$() from $(item)Tree Logs$() using a $(item)Tree Fluid Extractor$(), this machine does not require any $(item)Power$() to function.$(br2)The $(item)Latex$() is processed together with $(item)Water$() inside a $(item)Latex Processing Unit$() to create $(item)Tiny Wet Rubber$().$(br)This process requires $(item)Power$().
The $(item)Tiny Wet Rubber$() is compacted in a $(item)Compactor$() and then finally dried on a $(item)Drying Rack$().

This $(item)Plastic$() is not very sturdy and is only fit to be used in the construction of some $(item)Machines$().$(br2)However you can later reuse it to create a much more robust type of $(item)Plastic$().
